ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
list=[];
if(/profile/.test(baseUrl)){
	result = java.getElements("@class.table@tbody@tr").toArray();
	for(i in result){
		java.setContent(result[i]);
		index=Number(i)+1;	xian=java.getString("@@tag.span@text||tag.span@class##.*é™.*|.*sign.*##â€¢ğŸ—")
		text=java.getString("@@tag.a.0@text");
		href=java.getString("@@tag.a.0@href");
		word=java.getString("@@tag.th.2@text");
		time=java.getString("@@tag.th.6@text");
		other=java.getString("@@tag.a.1@text")
		
	list.push({
		  text:index+"  | "+text+xian,
		  href:href,
		  intro:word+"å­— "+time+"  "+other
		})
	}
}else{
allpage =	String(java.getString("@class.pagination@li.-2@a@href")).match(/page=(\d+)/)[1];
	for(i=1;i<=allpage;i++){
		list.push({
			text: "ç¬¬"+i+"é¡µ",
			href: baseUrl+"?page="+i
			})	
		}
	}
list
</js>
